alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 12:27PM MDT until July 08 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 130 PM MDT. * At 1227 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles north of Sheridan Lake, or 8 miles northeast of Hill City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sheridan Lake around 1245 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rockerville, Keystone Wye, Horse Thief Lake, Mount Rushmore National Memorial and Keystone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
